jd: Hi,This is Shanu Francis from Parmesoft. We have an immediate opening for Python Automation Tester -Basking Ridge, NJ or Irving, TX(ONSITE)with my client. So, Please have a look on the Job Description below and reply me back if you are interested.Position: Python Automation Tester -Basking Ridge, NJ or Irving, TX(ONSITE)Location: Basking Ridge, NJ or Irving, TX(ONSITE)Long term ContractJob Description: with Verizon experience Required-Able to write python script for automation (writing small programs that automate repetitive tasks)-Able to deploy script on onprem /Cloud server-Able to execute /test Python script in citrix environment-Able to embed and trigger python script on a web page (react) Thanks& Regards Shanu Francis _____________________ Parmesoft Inc. 2626 Cole Ave,Ste:300 Dallas, TX. 75204 Phone: 469-591-7441 Fax: 972-402-5580 Email: shanu.f@Parmesoft.com
